name: Ascension Upper Deck (Free Early Access, 0.2)
description:
Ascension Upper Deck is a standalone mini card game, based on my main game Ascension Universe.

You are trying to become an Uzanium Guard, to do this you must successfully complete all the scenarios. Which may happen for real when patrolling Uzanium territory. After completing each scenario you will be able to purchase new system cards to place into your hand.

As you can see these very early versions are free, this is to develop the game with help from the itch community. Everything  is work in progress including in game pictures and effects.

Follow my Development Logs to keep up to date with the newest features.

Controls:

Arrow Keys = Use/Purchase Card

Space = Next Turn/Scenario
